abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for the Cameroon
            Petroleum Development and Pipeline Project and the Petroleum
            Environment Capacity Enhancement Project (CAPECE) summarizes
            the Request and Response documents and examines all areas of
            inspection.  The Eligibility Report determines that the
            investigation will only involve the area in Cameroon where
            the Pipeline Project is located.  After examining the
            claims, the Panel is satisfied that the eligibility criteria
            has been met. The Panel also recommends that further
            investigations to the claims take place.
